content: this pattern uses knit/purl texture use size 6 needles for starting and ending borders and size 8 needles for rest of blanket correction 5/12/2025 - corrected row 12 in written instructions chart was already correct reloaded pattern old row 12 ws k1 * k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 * new row 12 ws k1 * k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 **k2** * correction 6/1/2025 - corrected total number of stitches per repeat on page 2 - corrected numbers bold below formula and 10 repeats was already correct multiple of 12 stitches + 1 + border 2 * 8 10 repeats across = 12 * 10 + 1 + 16 = 137 sttiches **125** stitches 9 repeats **149** 11 repeats **161** 12 repeats **173** 13 repeats
